data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Empitrombium Southcott, 1994 (Acari: Microtrombidiidae) from Turkey

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sevsay, Sevgi, Karakurt, İbrahim (2013): A new species of the genus Empitrombium Southcott, 1994 (Acari: Microtrombidiidae) from Turkey. Zootaxa 3709 (3): 255-266, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3709.3.4
